Uses of Class
nachos.network.MailMessage

Packages that use MailMessage
nachos.network Provides classes that allow Nachos processes to communicate over the network. 
 

Uses of MailMessage in nachos.network
 

Methods in nachos.network that return MailMessage
 MailMessage PostOffice.receive(int port)
          Retrieve a message on the specified port, waiting if necessary.
 

Methods in nachos.network with parameters of type MailMessage
 void PostOffice.send(MailMessage mail)
          Send a message to a mailbox on a remote machine.
